alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:06PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT APACHE AND NAVAJO COUNTIES NEAR PINETOP-LAKESIDE THROUGH 530 PM MST... At 505 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Show Low, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Pinetop-Lakeside, Woodland Reservoir, Cooley Lake, Hon-dah, Wagon Wheel, McNary, Rainbow Lake, Porter Mountain Outlook, Lake of the Woods, Show Low Lake, Bootleg Lake, Big Mountain, Show Low Airport, Pinetop Country Club, Lakeside Campground, and Scott Reservoir Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 345 and 361. State Route 73 between mile markers 356 and 357. Highway 60 between mile markers 331 and 339, and between mile markers 345 and 351. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
